title: Parents and Grandparents: Tips for Communication
itunes:author: Guest: Michele Howe
itunes:summary:
Grandparents can play a significant role in their grandchild's life by offering their unconditional love. John and Danny list topics for grandparents and parents to discuss to prevent misunderstandings.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "There's a Reason the Call it GRANDparenting" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-06-15?refcd=1101201

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/parents-and-grandparents-tips-for-communication/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: http://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
